comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Posters announce the 
Women's Political Union 
=Votes for Women=
ENTERTAINMENT AND BALL
to be given on
SATURDAY, JANUARY 31

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Suffragette gathering in NYC to publicize the upcoming Suffragette Ball and Dance Exhibition, to be held at the 71st Street Armory on January 31, 1914. Other Bain/LOC photos of this event:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4798747595/in/photostream/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4799379538/in/photostream/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4799379974/in/photostream/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4799379832/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 91994779@N02
comment._content: First thing I thought of was that opening scene in Mary Poppins, "Votes For Women!"
